author: Emma Chase
description: Defense attorney Stanton Shaw keeps his head cool, his questions sharp, and his arguments irrefutable. Sofia Santos is a city-raised, no-nonsense litigator and Stanton’s friend and lover. She agrees to help him win back the woman he loves, only to fall for him herself.

title: Bachelorette for Sale
author: Gail Chianese
description: This sparkling debut dives right in to everything funny, flirty, and fiery about modern dating with the tale of a sexy singles auction that comes with the prize of a lifetime.

title: A Heart Revealed
author: Josi S. Kilpack
description: Amber Marie Sterlington, the rage of the season in Regency-era London, wants a husband with a title and a fortune. Why would she look twice at Thomas Richards, a third son of a country lord? But when Amber’s social standing is threatened, the character of her future husband becomes far more important than his position. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Myth and Magic
author: Mae Clair
description: Caith Breckwood left his teen sweetheart, Veronica Kent, after a traumatic event left him afraid to pursue a future together. Twelve years later, Caith, now a PI, is hired to investigate bizarre incidents at the secluded retreat Veronica manages. Both are forced to face their nightmares—and the love they’ve never forgotten.

title: Driving Heat
author: Zuri Day
description: opens a five-book contemporary romance series about blue-collar brothers who meet their romantic matches. Eldest brother Byron is a bus driver and single dad with no time to date; Cynthia Hall has been successful in her career and unlucky in love. When their worlds collide, sparks fly.

title: The Unleashing
author: Shelly Laurenston
description: With her trademark outrageous humor, Laurenston introduces a paranormal romance series featuring a band of tough-as-nails female fighters and the men who aren’t afraid to stand up to them.

title: Trowchester Blues
author: Alex Beecroft
description: When policeman Michael May’s abusive father dies, he returns to his childhood home, with all its old fears and memories. Fintan Hulme retired from his work as a high-class London fence and opened a bookshop. The ex-cop and the ex-crook couldn’t be a more unlikely match, but they can’t stay apart.

title: Misfits
author: Garrett Leigh
description: Tom and Cass are business and life partners, but their work often keeps them apart. Then Tom meets Jake, and both men fall for him. When the darkness of Cass’s past returns, Jake must work to help the men he’s grown to love stay together.

title: Come Again: Sex Toy Erotica, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: In the latest collection from award-winning editor Bussel, sex toys bring couples, singles, and strangers to new heights of pleasure.

title: Flings: Sexy One-Night-Only Encounters, edited
author: Violet Blue
description: collects the most delightful, the dirtiest, and the wildest one-night-stand fantasies. Always surprising, often romantic, these stories of flings will inspire readers to spin their own tales of love, lust, and fantasy.

title: Forever Your Earl: The Wicked Quills of London
author: Eva Leigh
description: Leigh makes her Avon debut with this smart and sexy Regency. What more could a scandal writer want than a secret look into the life of a devilishly handsome rake? And what better way for him to distract her than by feeding her the scandal she desperately craves? 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Cold-Hearted Rake
author: Lisa Kleypas
description: Kleypas makes a long-awaited return to historical romance with this Regency series launch, the sizzling story of the woman daring enough to reform a notoriously wicked rake by beating him at his own game of seduction. 600,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Rogue Not Taken
author: Sarah MacLean
description: He thinks she’s trying to trick him into marriage. She wouldn’t have him if he were the last man on earth. But carriages bring close quarters, dark secrets, and unbearable temptation in MacLean’s Regency romance, which begins an exciting new series. 250,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Undaunted: Knights in Black Leather
author: Ronnie Douglas
description: This first in a sexy, dark new adult series tells the thrilling story of a young woman who’s drawn to a Southern motorcycle club’s inner circle—and a dangerously hot biker. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Tryst: A Sexual Education Novel
author: S.L. Jennings
description: From the bestselling author of Taint comes this steamy novel of a happy couple who decide to open their marriage to add spice to their sex life—and end up in a situation that neither expected. 25,000-copy announced first printing.

title: One Scandalous Kiss: An Accidental Heirs Novel
author: Christy Carlyle
description: Christy Carlyle’s debut Victorian historical romance delights in the first book of her Accidental Heirs series, in which a suffragist bookshop owner agrees to a devil’s bargain that results in one scandalous kiss.

title: Hotbed
author: Portia Da Costa
description: Sister Natalie and Patti are as opposite as can be. While Patti has been voraciously bedding a whole host of hunks, shy and retiring Natalie can only dream of an illicit liaison. But that changes when she gives in to temptation and initiates a sexy encounter on a train with a complete stranger.

title: Ransom Canyon
author: Jodi Thomas
description: opens an emotionally resonant series set in a remote west Texas town. The lives, loves, and ambitions of four families will converge, set against a landscape as unforgiving as it is beautiful, where passion, property, and pride are worth fighting for.

title: When Secrets Strike
author: Marta Perry
description: An ominous blaze brings an Amish quilter and a firefighter back together as buried feelings resurface. When a string of horrific incidents tears apart their community and an arsonist’s wrath threatens to destroy them all, will they risk both their hearts and their lives?

title: Stars of Fortune: Book One of the Guardians Trilogy
author: Nora Roberts
description: As gifts for a queen, three guardians sent stars into the sky—of fire, ice, and water. Centuries later, the stars are within reach of three women and three men. But a shadow looms over their attempts at trust, unity, and love. 2,000,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Mastered
author: Maya Banks
description: launches a dark, edgy erotic romance series with BDSM elements, exploring the games men and women play, and the price they’re willing to pay for pleasure. 350,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Blood Kiss: Black Dagger Legacy
author: J.R. Ward
description: The legacy of the Black Dagger Brotherhood continues in a spinoff series about new recruits ready to train with the renowned warriors. 250,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Falling Like Snowflakes
author: Denise Hunter
description: Romance novelist Hunter begins a new series about a family of brothers with this Christmastime contemporary, in which one brother struggles to save the family farm—and his heart—from a stranger who shows up with her young son and a past full of secrets.

title: Lost in His Eyes: A Novel of Romantic Suspense
author: Andrew Neiderman
description: A California housewife begins an ill-advised affair—with devastating consequences.

title: Choose Your Own Love Story: Adventures in Dating, Do Overs, and Finding Your Happily Ever After
author: Ilyse Mimoun
description: Choose a different love story each time you open the book, putting you in the driver’s seat and letting you make more than 50 choices, picking from multiple possible endings. 20,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Lady’s Command
author: Stephanie Laurens
description: Bestseller Laurens launches a new Regency series featuring the adventures of four seafaring brothers and the women who capture their hearts.

title: Beautiful Storm
author: Barbara Freethy
description: In the first of three connected novels, a lightning strike leads to love, danger, and the unraveling of a family mystery.

title: Lead Me Not
author: Ann Gallagher
description: This story of a preacher who chooses to be gay in order to prove that one can choose not to be—and then falls in love with another man—breaks taboos in every direction.

title: Everything I Left Unsaid
author: M. O’Keefe
description: opens a gritty and sexy contemporary romance duology in which a phone call from a mysterious stranger is picked up by the wrong woman and ignites a dangerous game of seduction. 25,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Avelynn
author: Marissa Campbell
description: In the year 869, Avelynn, the beautiful and secretly pagan daughter of the Eadlorman of Somerset, is betrothed to a man who covets her wealth and status. After Viking berserkers land, one of them wins her heart. Can the two be true to their people as well as to each other?

title: First Touch
author: Laurelin Paige
description: Determined to track down her missing friend, Amber, Emily Wayborn follows a chain of clues that lead her to the enigmatic billionaire Reeve Sallis. She must seduce him to learn his secrets and find her friend. But will Emily be able to abandon her desire for Reeve in order to save Amber?

title: Brave the Heat
author: Sara Humphreys
description: Old flames rekindle with dangerous consequences in this new contemporary romance from the acclaimed author.

title: Down In the Valley
author: Jane Shoup
description: Miss Emeline Wright risked everything to escape the man who stole her innocence, and then to win over her scornful neighbors in her little West Virginia hometown. But it will take the quiet strength and unfailing love of a man to show her how to trust again.

title: Jilting the Duke
author: Rachael Miles
description: Aidan Somerville, Duke of Forster, is a rake, a spy, and a soldier, richer than sin and twice as handsome. Now he is also guardian to his deceased best friend’s young son—whose mother is Aidan’s ex-fiancé.

title: Don’t Get Me Wrong
author: Marianne Kavanagh
description: Londoners Kim and Harry can’t see eye to eye—until tragedy strikes. As they face the possibility of losing the person they both love most, long-buried secrets come to a head in ways that will change both Harry and Kim forever.

title: What Happens Under the Mistletoe
author: Sabrina Jeffries, Karen Hawkins, Candace Camp, and Meredith Duran
description: Four bestselling authors come together for a sizzling historical romance holiday anthology.

title: Rock Me Two Times
author: Dawn Ryder
description: Kate’s small custom leather shop is about to get a big boost with a partnership with the ultra hot rock band Toxsin. But she is definitely not prepared to enter into this elite, celebrity world, especially when Syon Braden, leader of Toxsin, starts making moves.

title: Viking Warrior Rising
author: Asa Maria Bradley
description: A sexy immortal Viking warrior and a kick-ass heroine collide in this smoking-hot paranormal romance.

title: A Cowboy Firefighter for Christmas
author: Kim Redford
description: Misty Reynolds pulls into town just in time to help Trey, a rancher and top volunteer firefighter of Wildcat Bluff, put out a suspicious fire. Misty’s past has left her with terrible memories of fire and of Christmastime. But that’s all about to change.

title: The Duke’s First Son
author: Jane Ashford
description: With the newfound freedom of marriage, a refined duke and a chaste duchess can finally explore pleasures of the flesh in this tender Regency romance.

title: In Search of Scandal
author: Susanne Lord
description: When an adventurer living in Victorian London is called to join a critical expedition, can he leave his beloved behind? She may just show him that she has an adventurous spirit to rival his own.

title: Cam Girl
author: Leah Raeder
description: Everything Vada loved is gone. She’s got nothing left to lose. So when she meets a smooth-talking lothario who offers to set her up as a cam girl, she can’t say no. It’s all just kinky fun until a client gets serious.

title: Denial
author: Lisa Renee Jones
description: This sultry tale of possession, ecstasy, wild fantasies, and dangerous secrets is the first in the racy and suspenseful Careless Whispers series.

title: Dirty Heat
author: Cairo
description: one-night stands, weekend flings, lustful online affairs—Cairo serves up six naughty tales of deceit in the sheets. In the scandalous world of infidelity, there is no end to sexual imagination and forbidden lust.

title: Shifting Time
author: Kelly Bennett Seiler
description: Meade Peterson has spent 15 years grieving the death of Daniel, her high school sweetheart. Then Tucker walks into her life and she begins to dream of a future with him. When Meade is transported into an alternate universe where she and Daniel built a life together, she’s faced with a difficult choice.

title: Once Beloved
author: Amara Royce
description: In bustling Victorian London, a desperate woman turns to the last man who would ever want to come to her aid.

title: Lover’s Oak
author: Corinne Scott
description: Lilly is a plucky Southern girl humbled by hardship whose survival depends on her holding her head high in a town where she is no longer welcome. And the most difficult person to face is the hunky fiancé she left behind.

title: Ever After
author: Odessa Gillespie Black
description: In order to inherit a millionaire’s fortune, Allie Knowles must survive a month on her property—but the enormous house is haunted by a violent ghost, and Cole Kinsley, the handsome groundskeeper, appeared in Allie’s dreams years before she ever met him.

title: Here He Comes Again
author: Melissa Shirley
description: Jocelyn married her high school sweetheart, Keaton Shaw—only to have him break her heart. Years after they divorce and he left their small town, Keaton walks into Jocelyn’s bakery and demands a second chance with the woman he still calls his wife.

title: Waiting for Ethan
author: Diane Barnes
description: Gina’s Mr. Right is nowhere in sight—until the day she’s stranded in a snowstorm and rescued by a man she was destined to marry (according to her best friend’s psychic grandmother). Does she dare question destiny and write her own story?

title: A Wedding in Truhart
author: Cynthia Tennent
description: Truhart, Mich., population 1,300 and dropping, is the unexpected site of the celebrity wedding of the year. The famous bride’s big sister, Annie, had an embarrassing childhood crush on Nick—who’s now the best man.

title: Games Women Play
author: Zaire Crown
description: At 37, Tuesday is eager for a better way of life. Her all-female “business” team has made a fortune using a gentlemen’s club to attract, seduce—and rob—wealthy men. But circumstances force her to choose between the love she’s always wanted, the team she swore loyalty to, and the money she desperately needs to save her own life.

title: Lonely Hearts
author: Heidi Cullinan
description: Until now, Baz’s friends have kept his painful past at bay. But as college ends, his friends are moving on. With loneliness looming, he hooks up with Elijah Prince. When the media hounds drag their pasts into the light, they must fight to keep their love alive.

title: Me and My Boi: Queer Erotic Stories, edited
author: Sacchi Green
description: celebrates lesbian bois, butches, and screw-the-binary free spirits; cool bois, hot bois, swaggering bois, shy bois, leather bois, flannel bois, butch daddies, and the girls (and other bois) who wouldn’t have them any other way. Gender has no boundaries, and neither does lust.

title: The Beebo Brinker Omnibus: Ann Bannon’s Pulp Classics by Ann Bannon, foreword
author: Lily Tomlin
description: The “queen of lesbian pulp fiction” defined lesbian fiction for the pre-Stonewall generation. The Beebo Brinker Chronicles, Vol. 1, includes the novels Odd Girl Out, I Am a Woman, and Women in the Shadows.

title: My Fair Gentleman
author: Nancy Campbell Allen
description: Jack would rather be at sea, but inheriting his grandfather’s wealth and title means joining the ranks of high society and living with the aristocracy. Luckily, Ivy Carslisle is willing to teach him etiquette—and win his heart. 30,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Emerald Springs
author: Fleur McDonald
description: When suspicions are wrongly aimed at a young woman following the theft of proceeds from the local rodeo, she must work with a skeptical rural detective to clear her name—and that of the man she loves.

title: Christmas for One
author: Amanda Prowse
description: As a child in foster care, Meg always dreamed of her perfect Christmas, and she can finally make it come true for her son. Who cares if there’s no devoted husband? But a chance meeting with a handsome stranger unravels everything she’s planned.

title: The Lavender House Mob
author: Annie Crux
description: When widowed novelist Louise Gregory’s life is turned upside down, can she regain her peaceful home and regain her trust in a man she thought she knew?

title: Bitter Springs
author: Laura Stone
description: In 1870s Texas, Renaldo Valle Santos, the youngest son of a large and traditional family, is sent to learn horse-catching from Henry “Hank” Burnett, a freed slave. Their love story is a sweeping epic that takes themes from traditional Mexican literature and westerns.

title: Just Kiss Me
author: Rachel Gibson
description: A housekeeper turned Hollywood star is reunited with her former employer’s son, a stockbroker turned furniture maker, in this upside-down rags-to-riches contemporary romance. 350,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Because of Miss Bridgerton
author: Julia Quinn
description: Perennial bestseller Quinn launches a prequel series to her Bridgerton historical novels with this charming opposites-attract story. 750,000-copy announced first printing.

title: A Certain Age
author: Beatriz Williams
description: As the freedom of the Jazz Age transforms New York City, the iridescent Mrs. Theresa Marshall of Fifth Avenue and Southampton, Long Island, has done the unthinkable: she’s fallen in love with her young paramour, Capt. Octavian Rofrano, a handsome aviator and hero of the Great War. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Listen to Me
author: Kristen Proby
description: Seduction is quickly becoming the hottest new restaurant in Portland, and Addison Wade is proud to claim one-fifth of the credit. She can’t think of a better way to bring in new customers than live music. But when former rock star Jake Keller swaggers through the doors to apply for the weekend gig, she knows she’s in trouble. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Sweet Little Lies
author: Jill Shalvis
description: Bestselling author Shalvis launches a fun, sexy contemporary series featuring a boy, a girl, and a wily wishing well. 300,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Once a Rancher
author: Linda Lael Miller
description: Miller launches a contemporary western series with this dramatic romance between a ranch owner and a resort manager who unite to help a troubled teen. 650,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Best of My Love
author: Susan Mallery
description: In this emotional farewell to the bestselling Fool’s Gold series, two good friends try to understand what makes men and women tick, and end up falling hard for each other. 900,000-copy announced first printing.

title: If You Only Knew
author: Kristan Higgins
description: is a funny, frank, and bittersweet look at sisters, marriage, jealousy, infidelity, and moving on, from the bestselling author of the Blue Heron series. 350,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Obsession
author: Nora Roberts
description: The daughter of an infamous killer is quietly rebuilding a life for herself when her past comes back to haunt her. 750,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Alone in the Dark
author: Karen Rose
description: A detective and a journalist race to find those responsible for the murder of a young woman, and discover an even more sinister plot in the process. This heart-pounding romantic thriller is told in unrelenting real time.

title: A Buccaneer at Heart
author: Stephanie Laurens
description: continues the Adventurers Quartet with Regency-era intrigue, danger, romance, and passion. 550,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Discovering You
author: Brenda Novak
description: India Sommers once had the perfect family—until her ex-boyfriend killed her husband. Years later, she’s trying to start over. She’s interested in her next-door neighbor, but he’s the handsome “bad boy” type. If she gets involved with him, she could lose everything she holds dear. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: All I Ever Wanted
author: Katrina Mills
description: When Kinsley Bailey’s father dies, she’s left with a house she doesn’t want full of things she doesn’t need. She takes his antique gun collection to the firearms shop owned by her ex, Bastian Harris. Soon Bastian is giving her a whole new set of reasons to stay in the small hometown she despises.

title: Jonathan Unleashed
author: Meg Rosoff
description: This charming and whimsical new novel from National Book Award–finalist Rosoff is a perfect summer read about a young New Yorker’s search for happiness and the two dogs who help him find it.

title: The Blackbirds
author: Eric Jerome Dickey
description: Kwanzaa, Indigo, Destiny, and Erica are four best friends who would go to the ends of the earth for one another. Yet even their deep bond can’t heal all, as the women struggle with their own personal demons, drama, and steamy desire for the wrong men.

title: Danger, Sweetheart
author: MaryJanice Davidson
description: A no-nonsense farmer and a handsome city-slicker join forces to save an ailing small town in this sweet Southern contemporary.

title: Dirty
author: Kylie Scott
description: Lydia finds out on her wedding day that her fiancé has been having an affair with his best man. Trying to escape it all, she runs into the arms of a handsome ex-musician turned bartender. But can a broke guy with a dubious future really be the Mr. Perfect Lydia was looking for?

title: Under the Surface
author: Anne Calhoun
description: Det. Matt Dorchester keeps his emotions on a tight leash. But when he goes undercover to protect Eve Webber, a bar owner turned informant with a hit out on her, things spiral dangerously close to the edge of no return.

title: The Beast of Clan Kincaid
author: Lily Blackwood
description: Highlander Niall Braewick returns to his boyhood home, thirsty to avenge his parents’ deaths. Elspeth of Alwyn, the daughter of the man who destroyed his clan, is his best tool for revenge. But Elspeth’s beauty and spirit prove a formidable match for Niall’s heart.

title: Deceived
author: Kate SeRine
description: In this contemporary political thriller, Luke Rogan’s assignment is simple: bring young Elijah Scoffield and his mother to safety. Sarah Scoffield will do anything to protect her son—even if that means teaming up with a deadly stranger. But Sarah soon finds herself falling in love with her dark hero.

title: Fortune Favors the Wicked
author: Theresa Romain
description: In Regency England, an injured naval officer and a courtesan compete in a hunt for a cache of stolen gold coins.

title: Under Your Skin
author: Shannyn Schroeder
description: Norah O’Malley is seven months pregnant by a guy who ditched her. She never expected to walk into a tattoo shop and get her socks knocked off by instant attraction. Kai Ellis is big and gruff and sexy as hell, and most importantly, he knows how to listen.

title: Magnate
author: Joanna Shupe
description: New York City’s Gilded Age shimmers with unimaginable wealth and glittering power. The men of the Knickerbocker Club know this more than anyone else. But for one titan of industry, the business of love is not what he expected.

title: Once a Soldier
author: Mary Jo Putney
description: launches the Rogues Redeemed historical series with a passionate romance between two brave, determined fighters.

title: Missed Connections
author: Tamara Mataya
description: After a one-night stand with sexy Jack ends in disappointment, Sarah begins an online-only relationship with the anonymous writer of a Missed Connection all about her. Soon she’s juggling a physical relationship with Jack and an emotional relationship with her Missed Connection, but there’s only so much of her to go around.

title: Billionaire in Wolf’s Clothing
author: Terry Spear
description: launches a new wolf shape-shifter romance series. Real estate mogul Rafe Denali, is devoting his funds to top-secret research on shifter life spans. Jade Ashton’s child’s life is on the line, and she’s on a mission to uncover Rafe’s secrets. What she finds instead is a wolf who enthralls her like no other.

title: Dirty for Me
author: Jackie Ashenden
description: Ezekiel Chase was born into a rich crime family; now he’s a mechanic and underground fighter. Tamara Eliot is a hard-working corporate high-flyer who appreciates the finer things in life. Their connection is deep, dark, and explosive.

title: How Not to Fall
author: Emily Foster
description: This witty, sexy novel introduces two scientists who get caught up in lust, friendship, and other unpredictable experiments.

title: Uptown Thief
author: Aya de Leon
description: Marisol Rivera bankrolls her health clinic for poor women by fleecing rich men. When she starts planning a heist, she runs afoul of a seductive ex-cop and a powerful thug with a score to settle.

title: Make Me Love You
author: Johanna Lindsey
description: is a sparkling, passionate tale of an earl’s daughter who must convince a mysterious viscount to marry her and end his vendetta against her brother.

title: Everywhere and Every Way
author: Jennifer Probst
description: is the first in an all-new sexy series featuring red-hot contractor siblings.

title: The Do-Over
author: L.E. Bross
description: Bross’s contemporary romance debut is a fun and sexy tale of unlikely lovers struggling to leave the past where it belongs—behind them—and embrace a bright future.

title: The Shark
author: Mary Burton
description: Virginia State Trooper and tracker Riley Tatum investigates the murder of a teen runaway, triggering memories of the Shark, a serial killer she escaped years ago. Former FBI Agent Clay Bowman has a history and connection with Riley. When Bowman realizes the Shark is active again, he’s sure that Riley is the killer’s ultimate target.

title: Doing It Over
author: Catherine Bybee
description: Three girlfriends come together in their small Oregon hometown for their 10-year high school reunion. Mel was Most Likely to Succeed, Zoe was Most Likely to Never Leave, and Jo was Most Likely to End Up in Jail. But life rarely turns out as predicted.

title: Suddenly in Love
author: Julia London
description: Mia Lassiter is thrilled to finally put her artistic skills to use working for her aunt’s interior design shop in her hometown of East Beach. She encounters a scruffy but attractive man named Brennan—who’s actually Everett Alden, a world-famous rock star in hiding. As their personalities clash, tension simmers.

title: Finding Their Balance
author: M.Q. Barber
description: Between Alice’s headstrong insistence on pushing her sexual limits and Jay’s need to confront an

title: Loving Lies
author: Tina Donahue
description: Isabella is kidnapped as part of her uncle’s attempt to control her family’s fortune. When she is rescued, Isabella can’t imagine why a stranger would risk his life for her—until she discovers her rescuer believes she’s his betrothed.

title: A Will and a Way
author: Maggie Wells
description: Consummate ladies’ man Will Tarrant has made it to middle age without walking down the aisle. People think he’s antimarriage, but he knows he just hasn’t met the right woman yet. Then he lays eyes on Southern belle Betty Asher.

title: Perfect Pairing
author: Rachel Spangler
description: The transient ways of commitment-phobic chef Hal are in direct opposition to the stability that investment banker Quinn craves. Can they work together long enough to learn that distinctive ingredients make the perfect pairing?

title: Ten Days in August
author: Kate McMurray
description: From the Lower East Side to uptown Manhattan, a curious detective searches for clues on the sidewalks of 1896 New York—and finds a secret world of forbidden love with a beautiful female impersonator.

title: Packing Heat
author: Zuri Day
description: Douglas Carter loves working at the post office. His colleague Janice Baker is just biding her time until she can make it as a singer. As work forces them to get closer, they develop a strong connection.

title: 30 Nights
author: Christine d’Abo
description: Glenna, an over-analytical research assistant by day, decides to conduct some research into the sexy side of life. Gorgeous university professor Eric Morris offers to be her lab partner. Soon they’re both far more deeply involved than they expected.

title: To Love a Thief
author: Jane Beckenham
description: In 1851, jewel thief Nathan Hawk emerges into a life of respectability, determined to make up for past sins. But Rose Valetta’s father, Nathan’s old mentor, has been kidnapped, and she needs the diamond Nathan is guarding to buy his freedom. When they discover the gem is a fake, they race to find the real stone before it’s too late.

title: Cowboy Resurrection
author: Mia Hopkins
description: Marketing hotshot Monica Kaur has three months to plan and promote a rodeo. She enlists bullfighter Dean MacKinnon. He’s thrilled to begin a no-strings-attached affair with brainy, sexy Monica, but her close-knit Sikh-American family would sooner run him out of town than see her with a notorious rodeo romeo.

title: The Unicorn
author: Delphine Dryden
description: Delia and Daniel have a picture-perfect life. They like their jobs. They love their house. But there’s still something missing, and when they meet Mara at a local BDSM club, they realize it might be her.

title: The Secret of Hunter’s Bog
author: Ally Blue
description: For Koichi McNab, the shop he and his twin sister are opening in Hunter’s Bog Mall is a fresh start. Especially when he meets the hunky owner of the luxury camping goods store next door. As Koichi and Will become friends, then lovers, Will’s past and Koichi’s present tangle into a dangerous knot.

title: Behrouz Gets Lucky
author: Avery Cassell
description: “Only butch dykes need apply,” Behrouz writes in her online ad, eager to swap quiet evenings at home for a real relationship. Enter Lucky: younger, rougher, dominant, and far from perfect. Their first meeting quickly gets hot, and Behrouz is soon determined not to let Lucky slip away.

title: The One That Got Away, edited
author: Kristina Wright
description: There is something hopelessly romantic about the idea of connecting with a long-lost love. This luscious collection of second-chance stories celebrates longing and long-delayed fulfillment.

title: Forever and Forever: The Courtship of Henry Longfellow and Fanny Appleton
author: Josi S. Kilpack
description: It’s 1836, and 19-year-old Fanny Appleton, the privileged, bookish daughter of a Boston industrialist, is touring Europe with her family. Published author and poet Henry Wadsworth Longfellow is also touring Europe, but under very different circumstances. Could a book of Henry’s poetry, personally delivered, persuade Fanny to believe in a love that lasts forever and forever? 20,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Dinner at Rose’s
author: Danielle Hawkins
description: Jo Donnelly flees her civilized city life to take up a temporary job at the physiotherapy clinic in her small hometown. It’s not long before Jo’s eccentric honorary Aunty Rose begins hinting that Jo might want to spend some time with Rose’s bona fide nephew, Matthew.

title: Céilí
author: Moriah Gemel
description: Down-and-out musician Devon Caelin stumbles into an alley club called Céilí. He discovers that it’s home to a small community of Fae, and that he found it only because he is Fae himself. With mentoring from Fae lord Eldan, Devon unearths his past and discovers his magical abilities, but danger threatens.

title: Speakeasy
author: Suzey Ingold
description: At the height of Prohibition, recent Yale graduate Heath Johnson falls for Art, the proprietor of a gay speakeasy tucked away beneath the streets of Manhattan. When Art’s sanctuary is raided, Heath is forced to choose between love and the structured life his parents planned for him.

title: Who’s That Girl?
author: Mhairi McFarlane
description: Dodging a workplace scandal, Edie takes an extended sabbatical while she ghostwrites an autobiography for sexy actor Elliot. As she moves back in with her widowed father and judgmental sister, she relives the stress of her teen years, including trying to figure out who she is and who she wants to be. 400,000-copy announced first printing.

title: While the Duke Was Sleeping: The Rogue Files
author: Sophie Jordan
description: A shop clerk and a duke’s wealthy half-brother butt heads and win each other’s hearts in this historical romance series launch featuring characters from Jordan’s Debutante Files. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Do You Want to Start a Scandal
author: Tessa Dare
description: New York Times bestseller Dare makes her long-awaited return to Spindle Cove with a new novel combining her two bestselling series. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: First Star I See Tonight: A Novel
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips
description: Piper Dove wants to become the best detective in the city of Chicago. She starts by trailing former Chicago Stars quarterback Cooper Graham; when he spots her, she claims to be an obsessive fan. Coop’s life might be in danger, and Piper’s determined to protect him, whether he wants it or not. 200,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Frost Line
author: Linda Howard and Linda Jones
description: Lenna is Strength, a manifestation of the tarot card, and powerful beyond reckoning. But when she’s pulled into the human realm, everything is thrown into chaos. Caine’s duty is simple: return her or eliminate her. Instead, he’s drawn into Lenna’s dangerous rescue mission and blindsided by his growing feelings. 500,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Honor: The Breaking Point
author: Jay Crownover
description: introduces Crownover’s most complicated hero yet, in the first book in a romantic suspense series. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Dazzling: The Diamond Trilogy, Part 1
author: Elizabeth Hayley
description: Siobhan came to New York determined to become a successful artist. To pay her bills in the meantime, she’s the hostess at the Stone Room, a bar for the beautiful and the billionaires. She’s fine with being on her own—until tech billionaire Derick takes her breath away. 300,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Sunset in Central Park
author: Sarah Morgan
description: Love has never been a priority for garden designer Frankie Cole. The only man she feels comfortable with is her friend Matt Walker—but that’s strictly platonic. Can Matt persuade her to trust him with her heart and kiss him under the Manhattan sunset? 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Always a Cowboy
author: Linda Lael Miller
description: Drake Carson is the quintessential cowboy, but managing the wild stallions on his property is wearing him down. Luce Hale is researching how wild horses interact with ranch animals and with ranchers. Luce and Drake are at odds from the very beginning, but when Drake believes Luce is in danger, that changes everything for both of them. 600,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Under Pressure
author: Lori Foster
description: Leese Phelps’s road hasn’t been an easy one, but it’s brought him to the perfect job—working for the elite Body Armor security agency. And what his newest assignment lacks in size, she makes up for with fire and backbone. 325,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Someone to Love: A Westcott Novel
author: Mary Balogh
description: Bestselling Regency romance author Balogh launches a series with the death of an earl and a scandalous secret. Anna Snow grew up in an orphanage. When she discovers the late Earl of Riverdale was her father and she has inherited his fortune, she becomes very close with the new earl’s guardian.

title: Sweet Tomorrows: A Rose Harbor Novel
author: Debbie Macomber
description: The much anticipated conclusion to Macomber’s Rose Harbor series, set in the picturesque town of Cedar Cove, Wash., brings long-delayed love to fruition for one couple and a new start for another.

title: Someone to Love
author: Mary Balogh
description: Bestselling Regency romance author Balogh launches a series with the death of an earl and a scandalous secret.

title: Body and Soul
author: Jade Williams
description: With a bad breakup behind her and a milestone birthday ahead of her, love has become a four-letter word to music magazine director Carol Shaw. When she becomes a judge on a top reality TV talent search, she’s surrounded by competing hotties—and her sexy, tempting ex is one of her fellow judges.

title: Chasing Shadows
author: Karen Harper
description: Forensic psychologist Claire Britten has spent a lifetime fighting a neurological disorder. After attorney Nick Markwood’s latest case is overthrown by Claire’s expert testimony, he recruits her for his passion project—investigating mysterious deaths. 175,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Lord of the Privateers
author: Stephanie Laurens
description: Laurens concludes her acclaimed Adventurers’ Quartet, a passionate Regency-era drama played out on the high seas, in the sweltering heat of tropical jungles, and in the glittering ballrooms of Mayfair.

title: Where Two Hearts Meet: A Novel
author: Liz Johnson
description: Bed-and-breakfast chef Caden Holt needs to persuade Adam Jacobs to write a glowing article about the Red Door Inn. But he’s not the secret travel reviewer she believes him to be.

title: Coming Clean: Monkey Business Trio
author: C.L. Parker
description: The intense competitive rivalry that began between sports agents Shaw Matthews and Cassidy Whalen and quickly transformed into a game of seduction comes to a close in this emotional and fiery conclusion to the Monkey Business trilogy.

title: Tailored for Trouble: A Romantic Comedy
author: Mimi Jean Pamfiloff
description: In this sexy and sassy contemporary romance series launch, the unlikeliest of couples is brought together with just a little help from a cafe proprietor who’s secretly a matchmaker extraordinaire.

title: Destined for a King: The Bastard Brotherhood
author: Ashlyn Macnamara
description: introduces the strapping, audacious outlaws of the Bastard Brotherhood in an enchanting Regency-era tale of forbidden love between supposedly sworn enemies.

title: Addicted to You
author: Renita Pizzitola
description: is the sweet and sizzling story of two friends who each want more—and the love triangle that’s holding them back.

title: Hard to Hold: A Hard to Play Novel
author: Katie Rose
description: introduces a team of New Jersey soccer stars who score on and off the pitch.

title: She’s Got a Way: An Echo Lake Novel
author: Maggie McGinnis
description: Four mischievous girls from Briarwood Academy are sent to a remote campground in Vermont for the summer. Teacher Gabriela O’Brien agrees to be their chaperone. Luke Magellan spent years at Camp Echo helping needy, troubled boys. He scorns the spoiled rich girls and their uptight den mother—until he sees how much she cares about her students.

title: Her Darkest Nightmare
author: Brenda Novak
description: Dr. Evelyn Talbot survived an attack by a serial killer and now runs a psychiatric prison in Alaska. When a body is found, everyone is quick to point fingers at Evelyn’s patients, but she isn’t willing to let her life’s work be destroyed over false allegations. With the help of a handsome Alaska State Trooper, she starts piecing together possibilities.

title: Hard Rules: A Dirty Money Novel
author: Lisa Renee Jones
description: Shane Brandon is ready to take his family’s shady business dealings legitimate. He falls hard for Emily Stevens, seeing her as a force for good, and begins to trust her—but she has a secret that could destroy them both.

title: Hero in the Highlands
author: Suzanne Enoch
description: Gabriel Forrester is a hardened army major and abysmally bad at finding joy in anything. When he unexpectedly inherits a dukedom and a huge estate in Scotland, Gabriel dutifully checks in on his new holdings. The biggest surprise he faces is the woman overseeing the estate, who slowly begins to awaken his senses to life and love.

title: My Fair Princess
author: Vanessa Kelly
description: introduces the Improper Princesses—three young women descended from royalty, each bound for her own thrilling adventure.

title: Strawberry Wine
author: Darly Jamison
description: Addison Monroe was 18 when she fell for Jake Grady, a college student working on her family’s farm for the summer. Ten years later, Addy is engaged to a doctor and working in Atlanta as a physician’s assistant. Life feels full and satisfying. But on a return visit to Lakeside, Addy crosses paths with Jake again.

title: Wind River Wrangler
author: Lindsay McKenna
description: Shiloh Gallagher likes gray-eyed cowboy Roan Taggart’s dry humor—and the Special Forces background that lends him a stoic, powerful presence. She came to wide-open Wyoming to flee a threat that’s left her unable to write her novels. Roan helps her let down her guard, but danger has followed her west.

title: The Protector
author: Jodi Ellen Malpas
description: After fighting hard to be independent and happy, Camille Logan finds her life threatened as a result of her father’s ruthless business dealings. Ex-SAS sniper Jake Sharp agrees to be her bodyguard, and his duty to protect her soon goes deeper than a well-paid job. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Furious Rush
author: S.C. Stephens
description: Mackenzie Cox has a lot to prove. Daughter of a racing legend, she is eager to show the world that she has inherited her father’s talent in the male-dominated sport of professional motorcycle racing. The last thing Kenzie needs is to be antagonized by her rival team’s newest rider, Hayden Hayes—or to fall for him. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: A Promise of Fire
author: Amanda Bouchet
description: Catalia Fisa is a powerful clairvoyant known as the Kingmaker. Griffin is intent on bringing peace to his newly conquered realm in the magic-deprived south. When he discovers Cat is the Kingmaker, he abducts her. But Cat will do everything in her power to avoid her dangerous destiny, and she battles her captor at every turn.

title: To Love a Texas Ranger
author: Linda Broday
description: Swept into a desperate battle to save Sierra, a woman on the run from a ruthless band of outlaws, Texas Ranger Sam must put everything on the line to avoid failure.

title: Race the Darkness
author: Abbie Roads
description: Xander Stone uses his thought-hearing ability to solve cases for the Ohio Bureau of Criminal Investigation, but nothing prepares him for a voice that leads him to a woman with whom he has a deep and immutable bond. He will do anything to save her from a cult bent on fulfilling a terrifying prophecy.

title: The Coldwater Warm Hearts Club
author: Lexi Eddings
description: Lacy Evans had everything she wanted; then her boyfriend ran off with her receptionist and her clients’ money. Now she’s back in her Oklahoma hometown, feeling miserable. Jacob Tyler comes back from Afghanistan short part of a leg and some peace of mind, but he’s counting his blessings, and Lacy could be one of them.

title: Perfect Pleasures
author: Deborah Fletcher Mello
description: World famous MMA champion Zachary Barrett has returned to his home in Phuket, Thailand. Thanks to his twin brother, a renowned pro trainer in Colorado, Zachary is primed and ready for his next title bout—but his toughest match may be with the sports journalist assigned to write an exposé on him.

title: The Altogether Unexpected Disappearance of Atticus Craftsman: A Novel
author: Mamen Sánchez
description: follows an uptight Englishman who is sent to Madrid to close a literary magazine and the five fiery, close-knit Spanish women who must devise a plan in order to keep the jobs they love. This humorous caper includes linguistic mishaps, literary intrigue, a clash of cultures, and an unexpected romance.

title: First Step Forward
author: Liora Blake
description: Pro-football player Cooper Lowry is off the field and into some trouble—in the form of a very alluring, very free-spirited apple orchard owner named Whitney Reed—in the first installment in Blake’s Grand Valley series, set in smalltown Colorado.

title: In the Barren Ground
author: Loreth Anne White
description: In this exhilarating contemporary thriller with a dusting of romance, a young constable in the Mounties fights for her place and soon finds herself hunting a brutal killer in a tiny town in Canada’s frozen Northwest Territories.

title: Now That It’s You
author: Tawna Fenske
description: Talented chef Meg Delaney hasn’t spoken to her cheating ex-fiancé, Matt Midland, for two years. Ditching him at the altar after blurting out “I can’t” instead of “I do” would sour any relationship. But Matt’s brother, Kyle, is back in her life, stirring up feelings that are equal parts guilt and lust.

title: The Plan: A Novel
author: Kelly Bennett Seiler
description: is a dynamic and heartwarming love story between a woman who is left alone after the deaths of her husband and children and a trilateral amputee who’s a motivational speaker on the other side of the globe.

title: To Kiss a Thief
author: Susanna Craig
description: Sarah Pevensey had hoped her arranged marriage to St. John Sutliffe, Viscount Fairfax, could become a romance. But then she’s accused of being a jewel thief, and flees to a small fishing village to rebuild her life. Three years later, St. John finds Sarah and is determined to make her pay for her crimes. But the woman he finds is far from what he expected.

title: Lord of the Runes
author: Sabrina Jarema
description: As outsiders threaten Viking Eirik Ivarson’s homeland and all he holds dear, he vows to maintain his focus and avenge the jarl’s death. Asa Sigrundsdottir, a spirited shieldmaiden, is wary of the golden-haired warrior discovered half-frozen in a storm. Despite the shadows in her past, he chooses her to help him on his journey, but soon their bond is tested.

title: First Position
author: Melissa Brayden
description: Anastasia Mikhelson is the rising star of the New York City Ballet. She’s sacrificed creature comforts, a social life, and her own physical well-being. When she’s forced to work with upstart prodigy Natalie Frederico, sparks begin to fly onstage and off.

title: Camp Rewind
author: Meghan O’Brien
description: Alice Wu is at Camp Rewind, trying to overcome the social anxiety she’s battled since childhood. Rosa Salazar hopes camp will be an escape from the anonymous trolls who are threatening her over her feminist critique of a popular video game. Rosa and Alice’s unlikely friendship swiftly becomes something more.

title: Lysistrata Cove
author: Dena Hankins
description: Jack Azevedo, captain of a charter sailboat in the Caribbean, finds a mysterious uncharted island inhabited by Eve La Sirena, a superstar with an illicit plan to restore creative freedom to musicians worldwide. Jack’s arrival exposes her island retreat and jeopardizes years of work, but his sweet generosity whets her cruel appetites.

title: Looking for Group
author: Alexis Hall
description: Kit is sweet and clever and funny and a damn good gamer. She’s everything that Drew is looking for in a girlfriend—except that outside of the online role-playing game where they met, Kit’s a guy. But they can work that out. What may really drive them apart is that Drew sees the game as a hobby, and Kit’s entire life is online.

title: Far from Home: A Belladonna Ink Novel
author: Lorelie Brown
description: Pari has money, but needs a green card. American citizen Rachel is drowning in debt. When Rachel makes the off-the-cuff suggestion of getting married, Pari shocks her by taking her up on it—even though they both know Rachel’s straight. Can their friendship survive turning into marriage?

title: The Lady of the Lakes: The True Love Story of Sir Walter Scott
author: Josi S. Kilpack
description: Brokenhearted by his beloved’s engagement to another man, 19-year-old Walter takes refuge in the lake country of Scotland. There he meets Charlotte, a 26-year-old Frenchwoman who believes she will never find love. Despite their age difference, the two become cautious friends, and Charlotte’s quiet disposition and keen mind intrigue Walter. Though wary of risking his heart a second time, he finds himself falling deeply in love. 17,000-copy announced first printing.

title: McKellan’s Run
author: Nicole Hurley-Moore
description: Fate has brought Violet and her daughter, Holly, back to the house Violet grew up in. As soon as Violet runs into James “Mac” McKellan, she wonders if she should run all the way back to the city. Can she trust him, can she trust herself, or will she be burned again?

title: Summer at the Shore Leave Cafe
author: Abbie Williams
description: Struggling with the reality of single motherhood, the last thing Joelle Davis expects is romance with gorgeous, passionate Blythe Tilson, a summer employee at her family’s cafe. Does she dare to consider loving someone again, or will she be struck by the curse that keeps Davis women from finding love?

title: Camellia in the Tea
author: Avril Flower
description: Jurang Kumar, a new assistant at a tea garden, was not prepared for life in Assam. His life changes when he begins to fall in love with Kasayla, a beauty from a plant-picking gang. Political and environmental concerns form the backdrop of this emotional cross-caste romance.

title: Bind
author: Sierra Cartwright
description: Faced with the potentially overwhelming loss of her family’s fortune, Lara Bertrand turns to the one man who can help her, the gorgeous and powerful Connor Donovan. Connor is willing to help her out—for a price. He not only wants her hand in marriage, but also her total submissive surrender.

title: Luchador
author: Erin Finnegan
description: A young exótico wrestler in Mexico City’s professional lucha libre circuit charts a course to balance ambition, sexuality, and faith.

title: Idlewild
author: Jude Sierra
description: Set against the backdrop of Detroit’s revival, this is a love story between a widower who tries to revive the gastro pub he started with his late husband, and the premed college graduate he hires to help him.

title: Flying Without a Net
author: E.M. Ben Shaul
description: A secular Israeli software engineer working in Boston falls in love with a gay Orthodox Jew and sign-language interpreter. Will they be able to start a life together despite religious ideology that conflicts with the relationship they are trying to build?

title: Some Kind of Hero: A Troubleshooters Novel
author: Suzanne Brockmann
description: A former Navy SEAL and a resourceful writer, both single parents, team up to save the SEAL’s missing teen daughter, and find unexpected romance along the way.

title: His Alone
author: Alexa Riley
description: Paige is trying to outrun her past, but she keeps getting distracted by Ryan, a sexy heartthrob she can’t resist—and her boss.

title: After the Dark
author: Cynthia Eden
description: launches a romantic thriller series with an intense story about a disgraced FBI profiler who must save her reputation by stopping a sadistic killer. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Secrets of the Tulip Sisters
author: Susan Mallery
description: Sisters Kelly and Olivia Van Gilder had their hearts broken by brothers Griffith and Ryan Martin. When the four of them reunite, sparks fly again. 250,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Indigo Lake
author: Jodi Thomas
description: is a contemporary novel set in Crossroads, Tex. (the sequel to Sunrise Crossing, one of PW’s 2016 Best Books), uniting two long-feuding families through the power of love.

title: A Pleasing Temptation
author: Deborah Fletcher Mello
description: A passionate affair threatens to explode into drama when an entrepreneur discovers that her lover is the owner of a strip club she’s been financing—and is also one of its top performers.

title: The Girl Who Knew Too Much
author: Amanda Quick
description: On the 1930s California coast, a murder mystery brings together a rookie reporter with a nose for the truth and a magician whose stage illusions are far from his only secrets.

title: Blackthorne’s Bride: A Bitter Creek Novel
author: Joan Johnston
description: A rogue nobleman, a rescued lady, and revenge undone by romance all play a part in this American west historical novel of passion and deception.

title: The Chosen: A Novel of the Black Dagger Brotherhood
author: J.R. Ward
description: continues Ward’s bestselling series with a dramatic tale of a troubled vampire warrior and the woman who holds his secrets.

title: If Not for You
author: Debbie Macomber
description: In this opposites-attract contemporary, a sheltered young woman finally gets away from her conservative parents, only to meet a gruff mechanic who’s everything they warned her about.

title: Falling Darkness
author: Karen Harper
description: A forensic psychologist is helping the man she loves flee from a criminal mastermind. When their plane crashes, they and a handful of other survivors are left with a whole new set of problems.

title: Love Story
author: Lauren Layne
description: Over the course of a cross-country road trip, feuding childhood sweethearts get a second chance at love.

title: Finding Gideon
author: Eric Jerome Dickey
description: Bestseller Dickey brings his trademark sexy flair to an international thriller full of sex and mayhem.

title: Silver Silence
author: Nalini Singh
description: begins a new story arc in her super-popular Psy-Changeling paranormal series, pairing a tightly controlled Psy and a reckless alpha male Changeling.

title: The Billionaires: 100 Shades of Sin
author: Calista Fox
description: In Fox’s smoldering ménage romance, three childhood best friends reunite as adults and realize they don’t have to make impossible choices—they can just say yes.

title: How to Tame a Beast in Seven Days
author: Kerrelyn Sparks
description: This fantasy romance series launch from bestseller Sparks opens on the Isle of Moon, where Luciana has grown up hidden away because of her magical powers. Her life is upended when she enters an arranged marriage with a man who can harness lightning.

title: 72 Hours
author: Bella Jewel
description: Digital bestseller Jewel debuts in print with a romantic thriller about two desperate people trying to escape a murderer’s horrifying scheme.

title: The Bad Luck Bride
author: Janna MacGregor
description: In MacGregor’s Regency-era debut, a man out for vengeance forces his target’s fiancée, who’s supposedly cursed, to marry him instead. Soon their forced proximity causes surprising changes in their relationship.

title: The Deep End
author: Kristen Ashley
description: At the elite Honey club, powerful men give in to their desire to submit to dominant women. Ashley’s series launch follows one such pair as their kink connection develops into romance.

title: Come Sundown
author: Nora Roberts
description: A Montana ranch owner and her newest ranch hand turn to each other for help and support when women in the region are murdered and the ranch owner’s long-lost aunt suddenly reappears.

title: A Family Affair
author: Fern Michaels
description: After wealthy prince Malik and down-to-earth dancer Trisha embark on a whirlwind romance, she struggles to adjust to her opulent new lifestyle while helping family members who’ve fallen on hard times.

title: Dangerous Behavior
author: Nancy Bush
description: Julia St. James Ford has washed up on a beach with no memory of how she got there or how her husband, Joe, died. The police rule the case an accident. But Joe’s brother, Sam—Jules’s rescuer and her first love—suspects otherwise.

title: The Most Dangerous Duke in London
author: Madeline Hunter
description: opens a Regency-era trilogy about scandalous dukes looking for brilliant brides.

title: The Nearness of You
author: Dorothy Garlock
description: is a tender contemporary about finding home, whether it’s a special place or an even more special person. 10,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Starlight Bridge
author: Debbie Mason
description: is the second book in her latest contemporary series. 75,000-copy announced first printing.

title: One More Kiss
author: Samantha Chase
description: After bombing on Broadway, a rock star seeking redemption finds love in his hometown with his best friend’s kid sister in this low-key contemporary series launch.

title: Reckless Hearts
author: Heather Van Fleet
description: Debut author Van Fleet sets up a series with this sweet tale of three tough Marines raising a baby, which gets complicated when one of them falls for their new nanny.

title: The Five-Minute Marriage
author: Joan Aiken
description: In this repackaged 1978 Regency romance from renowned author Aiken, the daughter of an impoverished socialite enters into what’s supposed to be a fake marriage with her cousin in order to get money from her tight-fisted uncle—but the marriage is real and the consequences rapidly cascade.

title: Wanted and Wired
author: Vivien Jackson
description: In this postapocalyptic science fiction romance, when a by-the-books hit goes wrong, bounty hunter Mari finds herself and her mysterious handler, Heron, on the run. Their lives depend on their trust for each other, even as they both hide secrets.

title: Complications
author: Devon Scott
description: Three friends in Washington, D.C., embark on individual romantic escapades that lead them in very unexpected directions.

title: Dangerous Consequences
author: Lisa Renee Johnson
description: A psychologist and a neurosurgeon must defend their marriage against a dangerous stalker who wants to destroy it, in Johnson’s debut, a contemporary romantic thriller.

title: A Mother’s Love
author: Charlotte Hubbard
description: In Hubbard’s contemporary Amish standalone, complicated family and business ties leave widow Rose Raber and community newcomer Matthias Wagler struggling to find a path to love and happiness.

title: The Last Resort
author: R.S. Kovach
description: High-powered corporate executive and show-jumper Alejandra Barros breaks her wrist and heads to a Colorado resort ranch to recuperate. As she falls in love with ranch hand Hank Mathis, she begins to question her priorities and fast-paced way of life.

title: The Darkest Corner
author: Liliana Hart
description: Hart opens the Gravediggers romantic suspense series with an intense connection between a black-ops fighter who’s undercover as a funeral home assistant and the smalltown mortician he ends up working for.

title: Sweet Tea and Sympathy
author: Molly Harper
description: In this sweet Southern romance, an elite event planner from Chicago winds up in a small Georgia town and makes waves when she starts dating one of the town’s most eligible bachelors.

title: Intercepting the Chef
author: Rachel Goodman
description: opens a sports-themed series with a romance between a football player who owns a restaurant and the beautiful chef who works for him.

title: Unstrung
author: Laura Spinella
description: In this complex, layered tale of love and loss, a symphony violinist must come to terms with the decisions that have shaped her life while grappling with tensions in her marriage and a ghost from her past.

title: Claiming Grace
author: Susan Stoker
description: Stoker’s first Ace Security romantic thriller reunites childhood sweethearts. Logan is about to found a business with his brothers; Grace is struggling to escape her controlling family. They must find ways to help each other if they’re to rekindle their love.

title: The Lilac Bouquet
author: Carolyn Brown
description: An ancient family feud comes to a head when a woman determined to afford her dream wedding takes a lucrative job for a reclusive elderly man who’s still carrying a torch for her great-grandmother.

title: Love Runs Deep
author: Gail Chianese
description: Active duty is no time for romance, but when two naval officers find themselves in close quarters on a submarine, the temptation to fraternize is hard to resist.

title: Crossing Hearts
author: Rebecca Crowley
description: Chilean soccer legend Rio Vidal is driven to define a role on his new team in Atlanta, Ga. But he must also adapt to a new culture—and for that he needs the help of his translator, Eva Torres.

title: His Rip-Roarin’ Bride
author: Martha Hix
description: Packing a six-shooter, Lisa-Ann Wilkins roars into Lubbock, Tex., determined to take out the man who killed her best friend. But a shoot-out at the local saloon lands her in the custody of Sheriff Wes Alington—and the real trouble begins.

title: Fury’s Bridge
author: Brey Willows
description: The Greek gods are transplanted to present-day California in this romantic thriller, which matches avenging fury Alectho and an ordinary philosophy professor.

title: Royal Rebel
author: Jenny Frame
description: is a charming story of an alternate England where Queen George’s queen consort matchmakes between a misbehaving princess and the director of a hospice charity.

title: The Vicar’s Daughter
author: Josi S. Kilpack
description: Cassie’s ambitions are hampered by her shy, emotionally fragile older sister, Lenora, who must marry before Cassie’s parents will allow Cassie to come out in society, so Cassie hatches a plan to kindle a love affair between Lenora and handsome Mr. Glenside, a newcomer to their small village. 15,000-copy announced first printing.

title: No Strings Attached
author: Julia Kanno
description: A harried mother unexpectedly falls for a handsome young rock star when she and her teen daughter win tickets and backstage passes to one of his shows.

title: Borderline
author: T.A. Chase
description: Mac Guzman, Texas Ranger, is lead detective on a serial killer case rocking the city of Houston. He’s willing to take help from anyone, especially handsome FBI profiler Tanner Wallace.

title: Temporary Home
author: Aliyah Burke
description: A former Marine opens her home to a fellow jarhead who’s visiting his ailing mentor. Before long, they’re falling in love and having risky thoughts about making their temporary arrangement permanent.

title: And It Came to Pass
author: Laura Stone
description: Two young Mormon missionaries find themselves questioning their faith as they fall in love with each other.

title: Storm Season
author: Pene Henson
description: When Sydney socialite Lien Hong is lost and injured at a music festival in the New South Wales outback, wilderness ranger Claudia Sokolov comes to her rescue.

title: Beneath the Stars
author: Lynn Charles
description: Returning home to care for his ailing father, a designer on the brink of success meets a fire chief and a young boy who change his life.

title: The Sea King
author: C.L. Wilson
description: is the first Mystral fantasy romance since 2014’s The Winter King. A princess and a seafarer find unexpected love in the aftermath of war. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Duchess Deal
author: Tessa Dare
description: A duke who’s a traumatized war veteran recklessly marries a commoner, thinking she’ll be easily cowed—but she has plans that go far beyond producing his heir. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Wilde in Love
author: Eloisa James
description: launches a Georgian-era series. A duke’s adventurous son with a dramatic public life falls for a bookish woman who craves privacy. 400,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Woman Left Behind
author: Linda Howard
description: A battle-hardened black ops soldier risks himself to help the woman he loves—his communications expert—escape from deadly enemies. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: A Daring Arrangement
author: Joanna Shupe
description: Set in New York City’s Gilded Age, Shupe’s first book for Avon introduces an English beauty with a scheme to win the man she loves, and the American scoundrel who ruins her plans. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: You Say It First
author: Susan Mallery
description: opens the Happily Inc. contemporary series, set at a theme wedding venue, with a wedding planner and a carpenter falling head over heels for each other. 800,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Sugar Pine Trail
author: RaeAnne Thayne
description: An unlikely attraction between an ambitious librarian and a playboy military pilot leads to Christmastime romance. 700,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Merry and Bright
author: Debbie Macomber
description: Love blooms in unexpected places in this contemporary Christmas novel of compassion, second chances, and hope.

title: Promise Not to Tell
author: Jayne Ann Krentz
description: A broken promise reveals a terrifying legacy and brings two children of cultists together in this follow-up to When All the Girls Have Gone.

title: The Christmas Room
author: Catherine Anderson
description: is a standalone contemporary romance full of homespun holiday cheer, set in a small Montana town and featuring older protagonists with adult children.

title: Going Dark
author: Monica McCarty
description: The members of a top secret SEAL team can’t keep their passion under wraps in this contemporary romantic suspense series kickoff.

title: Starlight Curse
author: Stacey Kade
description: Two former teen actors—who played siblings—reunite as adults and find that sparks fly.

title: Right Where We Belong
author: Brenda Novak
description: returns to Silver Springs for a moving story about rebuilding your life when you’ve got nothing left to lose. 300,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Christmas at Two Love Lane
author: Kieran Kramer
description: Stubbornly single Southern belle Macy Frost co-owns Two Love Lane, the premier matchmaking agency in Charleston, S.C. She doesn’t expect that the Christmastime match she finds for a confirmed bachelor will be herself.

title: Maybe I Do: A Whiskey and Weddings Novel
author: Nicole McLaughlin
description: Wedding photographer Charlotte Linley loves her work, even though she was left at the altar. And she especially enjoys working with a fellow antimarriage cynic whose boutique distillery has become Kansas City’s hottest wedding venue.

title: The Road to Enchantment
author: Kaya McLaren
description: A woman who escaped smalltown New Mexico for Los Angeles comes back—pregnant, single, and grieving her mother’s death—to find a warm welcome from her long-ago best friend.

title: Christmastime Cowboy
author: Maisey Yates
description: launches the Copper Ridge contemporary series. As a teen, Liam fell for his boss’s daughter, and his boss bribed him to dump her. Thirteen years later, Christmas reunites them. 400,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Pretend You’re Safe
author: Alexandra Ivy
description: When a serial killer sets his sights on the victim he’s always wanted, she must turn to an arrogant sheriff who never believed her stories of being stalked.

title: His Perfect Partner
author: Priscilla Oliveras
description: Divorced ad executive Tomás Garcia shouldn’t even be thinking about his daughter’s alluring dance teacher, Yazmine Fernandez, but Yaz’s generous spirit and caring concern are sparking a desire Tomás can’t resist.

title: Liza’s Second Chance
author: Molly Jebber
description: opens an Amish romance series in 1912 Ohio, where a bakery brings people together for sweet treats, wise advice, and romantic connections.

title: Duke of Desire
author: Elizabeth Hoyt
description: Hoyt concludes her long-running Maiden Lane Regency romance series with a suspenseful novel that puts two passionate lovers in danger. 175,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Long, Tall Cowboy Christmas
author: Carolyn Brown
description: returns to Happy, Tex., for a holiday romance between a widow (whose three rambunctious kids play matchmaker) and a hermit cowboy. 125,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Caught by the Scot
author: Karen Hawkins
description: A dashing Scottish privateer looks for a wife who won’t mind his many mistresses, but the woman he wants to marry refuses to be an afterthought.

title: Fraternize
author: Rachel Van Dyken
description: A plus-size pro cheerleader falls into a love triangle with two sexy football players.

title: Cowboy SEAL Homecoming
author: Nicole Helm
description: Navy SEAL Alex McGuire inherits half his childhood ranch. The other half is left to a woman he barely knows—and she has an idea for turning the ranch into a haven for wounded soldiers.

title: Highland Dragon Warrior
author: Isabel Cooper
description: begins a prequel series, set in 1305 Scotland and featuring dragon shape-shifters, that explains the origins of Cooper’s Highland Dragons.

title: One Summer Night
author: Caridad Piñeiro
description: The Sinclair and Pierce families have been feuding for nearly 30 years. That hasn’t stopped Jax Pierce from noticing Maggie Sinclair, but getting involved in her failing family business means risking everything he cares about.

title: All I Want for Halloween
author: Marie Harte
description: is a sweet, funny standalone tale of masked strangers finding love on Halloween.

title: Third Son’s a Charm
author: Shana Galen
description: In the first book of a Regency romance series featuring the sons of nobility, a duke’s daughter resents her new bodyguard until he saves her from a kidnapping attempt.

title: Deadly Rumors
author: Cheris Hodges
description: A private investigator gets intimately involved with her friend at the FBI when he hires her in hopes of protecting her from those who want her dead.

title: Texas Fierce
author: Janet Dailey
description: An heiress is shocked to fall in love with her fiancé’s enemy in this suspenseful western romance.

title: The Spring Girls
author: Anna Todd
description: is a modern-day retelling of Louisa May Alcott’s Little Women.

title: Roomies
author: Christina Lauren
description: Two Broadway actors impulsively embark on a visa marriage, only to find that living together turns their besotted newlywed act into the real thing.

title: Breaching the Contract
author: Chantal Fernando
description: opens a contemporary series about a brigade of lawyers who always end up just barely on the right side of the law and love.

title: Dreaming of Manderley
author: Leah Marie Brown
description: An American in present-day France, struggling to care for her sisters after their family fortune is lost, is swept off her feet by a widower who won’t talk about what happened to his first wife.

title: Fool Me Once
author: Catherine Bybee
description: A divorced divorce lawyer gets an unexpected second chance for love, but her charming seducer is secretly a PI hired by a disgruntled client.

title: Captain’s Choice
author: V.K. Powell
description: Architect Kerstin Anthony’s life is going as planned until Bennett Carlyle, the first girl she ever kissed, is assigned to her latest and most important project.

title: Foxglove Copse
author: Alex Beecroft
description: A burned-out London executive finds a mutilated sheep in Cornwall and is suspected of killing it. Only a handsome young shepherd believes his innocence—and wants to win his heart.

title: Best Women’s Erotica of the Year, Volume 3, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: , contains daring, bold, and surprising tales of women who pursue their passions anywhere and everywhere.

title: All That Makes Life Bright: The Life and Love of Harriet Beecher Stowe
author: Josi S. Kilpack
description: looks at the early years of Harriet Beecher’s marriage to Calvin Stowe. Kilpack’s depiction of the challenges of juggling household management, childcare, and writing is convincing and touching. 17,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Lies Jane Austen Told Me
author: Julie Wright
description: An Austen fan is hurt when a man in possession of a good fortune tells her he wants a hookup rather than a wife, and surprised when she falls hard for his brother. 12,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Charming the Vicar
author: Jenny Frame
description: When stage magician and atheist Finn Kane seeks refuge in an English village after a spiritual crisis, local vicar Bridget Claremont attempts to restore her faith in life and love.

title: Until Tomorrow
author: Abbie Williams
description: A young woman trying to help her sister find the cause of a devastating fire is unexpectedly swept into love with an old friend.

title: Chasing Charlie
author: Linda McLaughlan
description: When unlucky-in-love Sam bumps into her first boyfriend, the charming but roguish Charlie, she falls for him all over again.

title: Forget Me Not
author: Em Shotwell
description: In this paranormal historical, a young man with little magic is matched up with a powerful mage, but just as they hit it off, he’s drafted to fight in Vietnam.

title: Absolutely, Almost, Perfect
author: Lissa Reed
description: Craig Oliver and Alex Scheff are a year into what seems to be a perfect relationship, but a family wedding brings up all sorts of tensions and complications.

title: The Leftover
author: Brooke Williams
description: A reserved wallflower discovers that reality TV is the perfect way to develop her confidence, and falls in love with the show’s medic, in this lighthearted romantic novel.

title: Rainy Day Friends
author: Jill Shalvis
description: Six months after Lanie Jacobs’s husband’s death, she learns he was a serial adulterer and each of his lovers believes herself his legally wedded wife. Desperate to make a fresh start, Lanie impulsively takes a job at the family-run Capriotti Winery and meets Mark Capriotti, a gruffly handsome Air Force veteran who manages to wind his way into Lanie’s cold, broken heart.

title: The Bride Takes a Groom: The Penhallow Dynasty, Book 2
author: Lisa Berne
description: Katherine Brooke is a fabulously wealthy heiress, but she’s a pawn in her parents’ ruthless plan to marry her into the nobility. Capt. Hugo Penhallow—charming, handsome, and from a noble but impoverished family—comes into her life once more, and she sees a chance to be free.

title: How to Forget a Duke
author: Vivienne Lorret
description: The duke of Rydstrom needs a wife, preferably one with a large fortune and a complete lack of curiosity. Jacinda is a professional matchmaker who’s sure the duke is hiding something. When amnesia strikes her, she forgets all the reasons she shouldn’t fall in love wih her client.

title: A Princess in Theory: Reluctant Royals, Book 1
author: Alyssa Cole
description: Between grad school and multiple jobs, Naledi Smith doesn’t have time for the constant e-mails claiming she’s betrothed to an African prince. Prince Thabiso, sole heir to the throne of Thesolo, is intent on tracking down his missing fiancée. When Naledi mistakes the prince for a pauper, Thabiso can’t resist the chance to experience life—and love—without the burden of his crown.

title: The Locksmith’s Daughter
author: Karen Brooks
description: In Queen Elizabeth I’s England, second-generation locksmith Mallory Bright can pick any lock. After scandal destroys her reputation, Mallory returns to her father’s home and lives almost as a recluse until spymaster Sir Francis Walsingham draws her into his world of codes, spycraft, intrigue, and romance.

title: A Lord for Whenever
author: Alexis Hall
description: When widow Marion Genley is paying her annual respects at her husband’s grave, almost a decade after his death, the last thing she expects is to attract the interest of a remarkably handsome and dissolute young man who turns out to be a duke’s son. Their clandestine romance becomes a shocking scandal.

title: The Other Lady Vanishes
author: Amanda Quick
description: returns to the 1930s seaside community of Burning Cove, Calif., where people with dangerous secrets go to reinvent themselves—and some pasts refuse to stay buried.

title: Someone to Care
author: Mary Balogh
description: Balogh’s fourth Westcott Regency romance foregrounds the dispossessed widow of the Earl of Riverdale, who throws all caution to the wind when adventure calls in the form of a handsome aristocrat.

title: High Voltage
author: Karen Marie Moning
description: Immortal Faerie, ancient feuds, secrets, and sacrifices fill the 10th installment of Moning’s Fever paranormal romance series, in which assassin Dani O’Malley and her lover, the immortal Ryodan, fight to save Dublin from a terrifying evil determined to enslave humankind.

title: The Kiss Quotient
author: Helen Hoang
description: Stella Lane thinks math is the only thing that unites the universe. Her algorithms to predict customer purchases lead to a job that pays her more money than she knows what to do with but leaves her no time to date. She hires escort Michael Phan to give her the sexual experience she lacks, and soon their no-nonsense partnership makes a strange kind of sense.

title: As You Wish: Summerhouse, Book 3
author: Jude Deveraux
description: One fateful summer, three very different women find themselves together in Summer Hill, Va., where they find they have much more in common than they realized. And when they’re presented with a chance to right the wrongs of their pasts, all three discover what can happen when dreams come true.

title: Shallow Grave
author: Karen Harper
description: Forensic psychologist Claire Britten and her partner, criminal lawyer Nick Markwood, volunteer with a support group for children stressed by domestic violence. But a leisurely field trip to a wildlife sanctuary turns deadly, leaving Claire to question whether the death was an accident, a suicide, or murder.

title: Welcome to Moonlight Harbor
author: Sheila Roberts
description: launches a contemporary series set on the Washington State coast. Jenna Jones is getting a divorce for her 40th birthday. She’s barely able to support herself and her teenage daughter, so when her great-aunt Edie invites her to help run the ramshackle Driftwood Inn, she leaps at the chance. New friends and and a handsome love interest help restore her faith in life.

title: Ocean Light: Psy-Changeling Trinity, Book 2
author: Nalini Singh
description: Security specialist Bowen Knight has come back from the dead. A chip implanted in his brain to block telepathic interference could fail at any moment, killing him. Changeling Kaia Luna has suffered too much loss in her life to fall for a human who is a dead man walking. When Kaia is kidnapped, Bo will do anything to get her back.

title: Smooth-Talking Cowboy
author: Maisey Yates
description: opens a contemporary western series set in Gold Valley, Ore. Olivia Logan has a plan: win back her ex by fake-dating someone else and making him jealous. Laid-back cowboy Luke Hollister wants her help convincing her father to sell him land, and agrees to help her if she’ll help him. Naturally, their plans go awry.

title: Guardian’s Bond: Ancient Ink, Book 1
author: Rhenna Morgan
description: Priest Rahandras has lived for years with the darkness trapped inside him.
